name: Spirited Away
text: Spirited Away is a 2001 Japanese animated fantasy film written and directed by Hayao Miyazaki. The film tells the story of Chihiro, a ten-year-old girl who enters a world of spirits and must work to free her parents and return to the human world.

name: My Neighbor Totoro
text: My Neighbor Totoro is a 1988 Japanese animated fantasy film written and directed by Hayao Miyazaki. The film follows two young daughters of a professor and their interactions with friendly wood spirits in postwar rural Japan.

name: Ashitaka
text: Ashitaka is the male protagonist in Princess Mononoke, a young Emishi prince who becomes cursed and must find a cure in the forest.

name: Chihiro
text: Chihiro Ogino is the main character in Spirited Away. She is a ten-year-old girl who enters the spirit world and must work to free her parents.

name: Irontown
text: Irontown is a fortress-like settlement in Princess Mononoke where Lady Eboshi rules and iron is produced.

name: The Bathhouse
text: The Bathhouse is a large bathhouse for spirits in Spirited Away, owned and operated by the witch Yubaba.

name: Spirit
text: Spirits are supernatural beings that inhabit the spirit world in various Ghibli films, including Spirited Away.

name: Spirited Away - English - Quote 1
text: Once you've met someone you never really forget them. It just takes a while for your memories to return.

name: Spirited Away - French - Quote 1
text: Une fois que tu as rencontr√© quelqu'un, tu ne l'oublies jamais vraiment. Il faut juste du temps pour que tes souvenirs reviennent.

name: Princess Mononoke - English - Quote 1
text: To see with eyes unclouded by hate.
